You throw tantrums like my son - and he is only 2, so that is to be expecte=
d - in an adult I expect more. I looked over all of the emails and none of =
them mentioned it was noise - or even implied that it was nothing more than=
 noise. The only thing that came close was a conversation that traffic was =
heavier then normal and some other email questions may have slipped through=
 the cracks.
	You can't jump into a group ready to find insult and slight a=
round the nearest corner just because not everyone agrees with your positio=
n. If you are looking for a junit advocacy group then this group probably i=
sn't it - this is more of a discussion and help/best-practices type of grou=
p. Are there disagreements among list-members, of course - do they discuss =
them openly, of course - do the members dig for the smallest believed insul=
t, no we are all adults here and understand that email is not the perfect m=
edium for discussions and intent is often masked behind the words.


Chip
-=
----
Programming: Its not just a job - its an indenture
